thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com
thread.title: AZ Mom

author: AZ Mom
title: AZ Mom
text: I highly recommend WholeLatteLove.com as an excellent source for all things related to coffee. I purchased my Gaggia espresso machine from them on their recommendation and have found it to be exactly what I needed in my kitchen. I order all my coffee from them and they are prompt in sending my order every time. In my opinion, this is a great company to work with!
